channel.title: Comments on: The ARL Leadership Institute – or how Ariel and Sarah learned about Learning Organizations

item.title: By: Sophia
item.dc:creator: Sophia
item.description: I agree with reinforcing feedback loops. I immediately thought about doing this with my team, but I never really thought about doing a self-reflection for my individual tasks. I want to incorporate this more into my day to day and figure out a formalized approach for my projects. Thank you for sharing, Ariel and Sarah. I'm looking forward to hearing more about how we can benefit from the LO model.
item.content:encoded: I agree with reinforcing feedback loops. I immediately thought about doing this with my team, but I never really thought about doing a self-reflection for my individual tasks. I want to incorporate this more into my day to day and figure out a formalized approach for my projects. Thank you for sharing, Ariel and Sarah. I’m looking forward to hearing more about how we can benefit from the LO model.
